content: {A抱歉}Just a moment, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, hoho! Thanks to your help with the residents' food orders earlier, everyone got to enjoy their meals with peace of mind!
info: 美味餐厅2-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Everyone chose to live here because of you, so naturally, we want you to be a part of every happy moment too, which includes tasting delicious food, hoho!
info: 美味餐厅2-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Lately, many residents have expressed their wish to get together for some good food and a chat during their free time. But sadly, our planet doesn't have a restaurant yet...
info: 美味餐厅2-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Why don't you pick a good spot for the <style=Highlight>Gourmet Restaurant Building Kit</style> and <style=Highlight>try organizing a food tasting event</style>? If you have any questions, just come see me at the Camp, hoho~!
info: 美味餐厅2-莫白_主流程文本3

content: So, I've prepared a <style=Highlight>Gourmet Restaurant Building Kit</style> for you. Please take it.
